name: br1steq
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(cop(c0, c1), c1st, c2), wceq(c2, c0))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Uniqueness condition for the binary relation ` 1st ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2015.)
